hamuda niladharin washayen thaman hamuda nithiyata menma siwil nithiyatath yatathya yana karuna sihi thaba gatha yuthu bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha prakasha keleya.rate gaurawaya surakime wagakima hamuda niladharin sathu bawa ki janadhipathiwaraya hamuda niladhariyaku wu pamanin siwil nithiyen midennata himikamak nolabena bawath pawasiya.janadhipathiwaraya me adahas pala kale shrimath jon kothalawala aarakshaka wishwawidyalaye upadhi pradanothsawayata kolambaa, bandaranayaka anusmarana jathyanthara sammanthrana shalawedi eeye (28) ekwemini.aarakshaka wishwawidyalaye upadhiya hadaru yuda, guwan, nawuka niladharin mehidi siya upadhi sahathika labagath athara sama athinma dakshatha dakwu niladhariya washayen “sword of da onar” sammanaya shri lanka yuda hamudawe dewana luthinan em. si. ee. dayas dina ganu labina.thriwidha hamudawa shakthimath nam thrasthawadayata nawatha hisa osawannata puluwankamak nathi bawa ki bawa janadhipathiwaraya ratak sanwardhanaya karannata samayath, samaya rakagannata sanwardhanayath thibiya yuthu bawa pawasiya.rate anekuth ayata wada winayen, danumen pirunu upadhidharin washayen wruththiyen, danumen manasa purawa ganna atharama mawubima kerehi aadarayen hadawatha purawa ganimata amathaka nokala yuthu bawath janadhipathiwaraya sandahan keleya.janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga, shrimath jon kothalawala aarakshaka wishwawidyalaye kulapathi jenaral je. ee. di. perera mahathwaru saha thriwidha hamudapathiwaru polispathi athulu pirisakda me awasthawata ekwuha..
